name: Dragon's Maze
description:
Enter the magical maze, gather as much treasure as you can and escape before dying to the horrors that lurk inside. The player who carries the most treasures out of the castle, alive and before nightfall, wins the game.

Dragon's Maze is an early prototype of a local multiplayer game for 1-4 players (yes, you can take on the castle solo if you wish). This game has partial  gamepad support.
